thread.title: Coleen Nolan is named winner of Celebrity Big Brother 2017 after beating Jedward in tense finale
thread.title_full: Coleen Nolan is named winner of Celebrity Big Brother 2017 after beating Jedward in tense finale

author: Lara Martin
title: Coleen Nolan is named winner of Celebrity Big Brother 2017 after beating Jedward in tense finale
text:
TV Coleen Nolan is named winner of Celebrity Big Brother 2017 after beating Jedward in tense finale Emma Willis announced the result on Friday night during a live show broadcast from Elstree Studios in London Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Watch the moment Coleen Nolan wins Celebrity Big Brother 2017 Share this video Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Coleen Nolan has been named the winner of Celebrity Big Brother 2017. 
She beat runner-up Jedward during Friday nightâ€™s live finale at Elstree Studio in London, after surviving just over a month inside the Big Brother house. 
Emma Willis announced the result at Elstree Studios, saying it had been an "incredibly close" vote. 
They beat stiff competition from fellow finalists Kim Woodburn, Bianca Gascoigne, Nicola McLean and James Cosmo . 
All the former housemates, except Chloe Ferry who was out of the country filming and Ray J , whose absence was unexplained, were at the CBB house tonight to congratulate the winner. Coleen is the winner! (Photo: David Fisher/REX/Shutterstock) Emma at tonight's finale (Photo: Channel 5) Read More Funniest moments of Celebrity Big Brother 2017 from Chloe giving John a lap dance to him impersonating Kim Woodburn 
Bianca Gascoigne was the first celebrity to leave the house on Friday night, finishing in sixth place. She left to cheers as she walked down the steps to meet Emma. 
In her exit interview, she confirmed things were over with boyfriend CJ Meeks and she wanted to date housemate Jamie O'Hara . 
"I expected to have fun, enjoy my time in there. I always wanted to do CBB and I was amazed I got picked. Obviously I found Jamie and the rest was history. Bianca finished in sixth place (Photo: PA) Bianca looked beautiful in white (Photo: Lia Toby/WENN.com) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
